faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about setting up your digital loyalty program.

items.question: How long is the free trial?
items.answer: 30 days, no credit card required. You get full access to all features during the trial, allowing you to experience the complete platform before deciding.

items.question: How do I create my loyalty card?
items.answer: Your card is created automatically during setup. Just upload your logo and pick your colors — you'll see a preview instantly. Customize anything you like, then publish when you're happy with it.

items.question: Do my customers need to download an app?
items.answer: No, Stampeo works directly through the web browser or can be added to digital wallets like Apple Wallet or Google Pay. Zero friction for your customers.

items.question: What equipment do I need?
items.answer: Any device with an internet connection. You can scan from our free app or directly from your browser — your choice.

items.question: How do customers get stamped?
items.answer: Customers simply scan a unique QR code displayed at your checkout, or you can scan their digital card. Both methods are fast and secure.

items.question: What happens when I cancel?
items.answer: You can cancel at any time. Your data will be held for 30 days if you change your mind, after which it will be permanently deleted. No hidden fees.
